meanings.definition: Plants that are green in color and considered undesirable or invasive.
meanings.sent1: The gardeners worked hard to remove the greenweeds from the flower beds.
meanings.sent2: The farmer struggled to control the spread of greenweeds in his fields.
meanings.sent3: The greenweeds seemed to have a party in the garden overnight!
meanings.sent4: The greenweeds took over the yard like an army invading a territory.
meanings.sent5: The greenweeds in the forest were so thick, they blocked out the sunlight.
meanings.sent6: In the meadow, the greenweeds grew taller than the flowers.
meanings.sent7: The greenweeds made the backyard look messy and unkempt.
meanings.sent8: The greenweeds seemed to multiply overnight, much to the gardener's dismay.
meanings.sent9: The greenweeds were so stubborn, they kept coming back no matter how many times they were pulled out.
meanings.sent10: The greenweeds swayed gently in the breeze, creating a sea of green in the field.

meanings.definition: To grow or proliferate rapidly, especially in a way that is unwanted or harmful.
meanings.sent1: If we don't take action soon, the greenweeds will overtake the entire garden.
meanings.sent2: The invasive species began to greenweeds in the once pristine forest.
meanings.sent3: The greenweeds in the yard seemed to have a mind of their own, spreading everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting the issue will only allow the problem to greenweeds further.
meanings.sent5: The rumors about the new plant species began to greenweeds throughout the community.
meanings.sent6: The greenweeds quickly took hold of the neglected field, choking out other plants.
meanings.sent7: The greenweeds seemed to multiply overnight, much to the gardener's dismay.
meanings.sent8: The farmer tried to greenweeds the spread of the invasive plants, but it was a challenging task.
meanings.sent9: The greenweeds in the garden seemed to have a life of their own, growing faster than anything else.
meanings.sent10: The greenweeds crept into the cracks of the pavement, showing no signs of stopping.
